name: syntaxconkyrc.vim
description: Syntax highlighting for conkyrc files used by the the Conky system monitor (http://conky.sourceforge.net/).
install_details:
Place it into ~/.vim/syntax/. You may wish to create a ~/.vim/ftdetect/conkyrc.vim file containing something like:
    au BufNewFile,BufRead *conkyrc set filetype=conkyrc
